author-notes.title: Article Information
author-notes.p: Open Access: This is an open access article distributed under the terms of the CC-BY License. © 2020 Go VF et al. JAMA Network Open.
author-notes.corresp: Corresponding Author: Vivian F. Go, PhD, Department of Health Behavior, Gillings School of Global Public Health, University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, 363 Rosenau Hall, CB# 7440, Chapel Hill, NC, 27599 ( vgo@unc.edu).
author-notes.p: Author Contributions: Drs Go and Frangakis had full access to all of the data in the study and take responsibility for the integrity of the data and the accuracy of the data analysis.
Concept and design: Go, Hutton, Chander, Latkin, Dowdy, Frangakis.
Acquisition, analysis, or interpretation of data: Go, Hutton, Ha, Chander, Latkin, Mai, Quynh, Nguyen, Sripaipan, Lancaster, Blackburn, Hershow, Frangakis.
Drafting of the manuscript: Go, Hutton, Ha, Latkin, Mai, Nguyen, Sripaipan, Lancaster, Frangakis.
Critical revision of the manuscript for important intellectual content: Go, Hutton, Chander, Latkin, Quynh, Sripaipan, Lancaster, Blackburn, Hershow, Dowdy, Frangakis.
Statistical analysis: Sripaipan, Lancaster, Dowdy, Frangakis.
Administrative, technical, or material support: Hutton, Ha, Chander, Mai, Quynh, Nguyen, Sripaipan, Lancaster, Blackburn, Hershow.

Conflict of Interest Disclosures: Drs Go, Ha, Chander, Latkin, Lancaster, Dowdy, and Frangakis and Ms Sripaioan reported receiving grants from the National Institutes of Health outside the submitted work. No other disclosures were reported.

Funding/Support: This work was supported by the National Institute on Drug Abuse of the National Institutes of Health under award number R01DA037440. This publication also resulted, in part, from research supported by the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill Center for AIDS Research, a National Institutes of Health–funded program (award No. P30 AI050410).

Role of the Funder/Sponsor: The funders had no role in the design and conduct of the study; collection, management, analysis, and interpretation of the data; preparation, review, or approval of the manuscript; and decision to submit the manuscript for publication.
Disclaimer: The content is solely the responsibility of the authors and does not necessarily represent the official views of the National Institutes of Health.

Additional Contributions: We would like to thank the Thai Nguyen Center for Disease Control for their support in conducting this trial. We also thank William C. Miller, MD, PhD (Division of Epidemiology, College of Public Health, Ohio State University) for his critical review on earlier drafts of this manuscript. We acknowledge the US Drug Testing Laboratories as the laboratory that conducted all phosphatidylethanol testing for this study. Finally, we wish to thank all of the site staff in Thai Nguyen, Vietnam, for their dedication to the study and the participants for their willingness to share their experiences through the study.
